mapper.sql: user_id, username, `password`, nick_name, user_type, email, phone_number, sex, avatar, is_enabled, is_credentials_non_expired, is_account_non_locked, is_account_non_expired, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, remark
mapper.select: select user_id, username, `password`, nick_name, avatar, is_enabled, is_credentials_non_expired, is_account_non_locked, is_account_non_expired, revision from sys_user where username = #{username} and del_flag = '0' limit 1
select r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and r.state = '0' and r.del_flag = '0'
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m where m.state = '0' and m.perms is not null and m.perms != ''
